indicator_name: Proportion of girls and women aged 15-49 years who have undergone female genital mutilation/cutting, by age
target: Eliminate all harmful practices, such as child, early and forced marriage and female genital mutilation
graph_title: Proportion of girls and women aged 15-49 years who have undergone female genital mutilation/cutting, by age
page_content: Since 2000 no girl or woman aged 15-49 has undergone female genital mutilation/cutting in Icelandic hospitals without an appropriate diagnosis, according to the Directorate of Health.
